paragraphs.title: 3 - Create hive database cloudhr

paragraphs.text:
%md

#### Hive Database Property MANAGEDLOCATION

The property MANAGEDLOCATION must be set to a URI when you specify an alternate location for a managed database.
Do NOT set LOCATION and MANAGEDLOCATION to the same HDFS Path. This will result in an error.
In Hive_on_Tez you must add the property metastore.warehouse.tenant.colocation=true to Hive Service Advanced Configuration 
(hive-site.xml).

msg.data:
Hive Database Property MANAGEDLOCATION

The property MANAGEDLOCATION must be set to a URI when you specify an alternate location for a managed database.
Do NOT set LOCATION and MANAGEDLOCATION to the same HDFS Path. This will result in an error.
In Hive_on_Tez you must add the property metastore.warehouse.tenant.colocation=true to Hive Service Advanced Configuration
(hive-site.xml).

paragraphs.title: 4 - Create table claim_saving
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudhr.claim_saving;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cloudhr.claim_saving(
  claim_date DATE,
  last_name STRING,
  client_id INT,
  claim_number INT,
  claim_code DECIMAL(7,2),
  claim_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
  risk_factor DECIMAL(7,7),
  claim_adjustment DECIMAL(7,2)
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudhr.db/claim_saving';

paragraphs.title: 5 - Create table employee
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudhr.employee;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cloudhr.employee(
  emp_id INT,
  name STRING,
  age INT,
  telephone STRING,
  email STRING,
  birthday DATE,
  country_code STRING,
  salary DECIMAL(7,2)
  )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudhr.db/employee';

paragraphs.title: 6 - Create table provider_summary
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudhr.provider_summary;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE cloudhr.provider_summary(
    provider_id INT,
    company_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    state_code STRING,
    zip_code STRING,
    regional_office STRING,
    business_years INT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
    paid_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
    adustment_amount DECIMAL(7,2)
    )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/tenant/cloudhr/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/cloudhr.db/provider_summary';
